SonicIDZERO-KNOWLEDGE

Welcome to SonicID

The future of digital identity verification through zero-knowledge technology and decentralized infrastructure.

Connect Your Wallet

Connect your wallet to access interactive demos and experience SonicID's zero-knowledge verification.

The Problem

  • Traditional identity systems expose sensitive personal data
  • Centralized platforms create single points of failure
  • Users have no control over their personal information
  • Reputation doesn't transfer between platforms

SonicID Solution

  • Zero-knowledge proofs verify claims without revealing data
  • Decentralized on Sonic blockchain for security
  • You own and control your digital identity
  • Build portable reputation across all platforms

How SonicID Works

1

Create Your Identity

Register your zero-knowledge identity with customizable verification levels

2

Generate ZK Proofs

Create mathematical proofs that verify claims without revealing sensitive data

3

Build Reputation

Establish cross-platform reputation while maintaining complete privacy

Sub-Second Verification

Lightning-fast proof generation and verification

Complete Privacy

Your data never leaves your control

Cross-Platform

Use your identity anywhere on the web

Open Source

Transparent, auditable, and community-driven
